## Trusted by experts
“We're thrilled to see innovative software companies like Quadrant Health leveraging technology to streamline human processes and enhance patient access.”

Amanda Laramie, COO
Coleman Associates
“[The] biggest benefit to using [Quadrant AI] in our practice is increasing bandwidth of providers to communciate effectively when they're outside the clinic. Overwhelming digital and phone communications are an enormous pain point.”
![user](https://quadrant.health)
Shirin Peters, MD
Bethany Medical Clinic
“Using Quadrant AI has been incredibly positive. It's shifted the way I think about care management and patient intake. Since I'm spending less time documenting, I can fully concentrate on patient interaction.”

Centre Médical Mieux-Être
“Having worked with many health technology companies, Quadrant Health's expertise in AI and ability to adapt in a rapidly changing field sets them apart. generated_description:
**Quadrant Health: Revolutionizing Preventive Care with AI**

Founded in 2020 and based in New York, Quadrant Health emerged from Y Combinator's W21 batch with a clear mission: to analyze Electronic Health Records (EHR) and messaging data to predict diseases before they strike. This proactive approach to healthcare leverages artificial intelligence to enhance efficiency and ultimately improve patient outcomes.

The team is small but mighty, just seven strong, focusing on the intersection of AI and healthcare IT. This nimbleness allows Quadrant Health to iterate quickly and respond to the evolving needs of healthcare providers, all while championing digital transformation in the industry.

Quadrant Health offers a unique platform designed by clinicians, specifically for clinicians. Their product suite includes solutions for Care Management, Scribing, and Administrative tasks, which can seamlessly integrate with existing EHR systems. This makes the tool not only a supplemental aid but a transformative partner in patient care. The focus is on automating routine tasks, allowing healthcare professionals to reclaim valuable time that can be redirected back into patient interaction. 

Key features highlight the efficiency gains: providers can save about 7.5 minutes per patient encounter, and collectively over 300 hours of documentation time annually. Furthermore, for every 1,000 enrolled patients, the platform can generate over $750,000 in revenue. These metrics are telling; they emphasize that Quadrant Health doesn’t just make life easier for providers—it also has a tangible financial impact on healthcare practices.

The company’s technology automates check-ins, post-visit documentation, and compliance tasks, all while maintaining a strong commitment to responsible AI and data security. The positive feedback from users, including clinicians from leading organizations, underscores a shared sentiment: less time on documentation means more time for care. As Amanda Laramie, COO of Coleman Associates, puts it, they are excited to see innovative companies like Quadrant Health streamlining processes to enhance patient access.

As Quadrant Health continues to grow, they stand at the forefront of a new era in outpatient care, where AI isn't just an assistive technology—it's a vital partner in delivering effective, efficient healthcare. If you're in the healthcare sector and looking to enhance efficiency while improving patient outcomes and possibly your bottom line, it’s worth seeing what Quadrant Health has to offer.

For more insights, visit their website at [quadrant.health](https://quadrant.health).
